DOC.brief_summary: This study compare repeat intermittent IV dose diclofenac patient moderate severe post-surgical pain abdominal pelvic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety IV Diclofenac ( DIC075V ) Pain After Abdominal Pelvic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective evaluate efficacy safety two dosage level parenteral diclofenac provide pain relief compare placebo Ketorolac tromethamine .
DOC.criteria: Scheduled within two week screen visit undergo abdominal pelvic surgery Moderate severe pain within 6 hour follow completion require surgery . Surgical procedure involve subcostal incision . Chronic disease recent cardiovascular event . Known allergy hypersensitivity active compound excipients use study . Additional Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria May Apply
